name: Savitribai Phule Pune University
description: I have done my graducation in Bachelor's degree in Information Technology at Savitribai Phule Pune University, Pune. I have taken courses in Data Structures, Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Database Management Systems, Operating Systems, and Computer Networks, among others.

name: PES Modern College of Arts, Science and Commerce, Pune
description: I completed my class 12 high school education at PES Modern College of Arts, Science and Commerce, Pune, where I studied Science with Computer Science.

name: Ravindra High School, Bhoom
description: I completed my class 10 high school education at Ravindra High School, Bhoom.
